name: Xcode 26.3
description: Apple's major IDE update unlocking 'agentic coding' capabilities, allowing developers to harness agents like Anthropic's Claude Agent and OpenAI's Codex directly within Xcode to tackle complex tasks autonomously.

name: CreateOS
description: Unified workspace to build, deploy, and scale apps from any AI coding tool in one place. Eliminates DevOps complexity and tool sprawl for AI development workflows.

name: Miro MCP
description: Turn code into visual docs and board context into code. IDE-integrated AI tool that bridges visual collaboration platforms with software engineering workflows.

name: Agent Sandbox
description: Provides AI agents with a personal remote computer and drive for isolated task execution. Offers secure environments for agents to run code and manage files.

name: GitScrum Studio for IDE
description: Full project management platform integrated directly into VS Code, Cursor & Windsurf. Brings Agile workflows into AI-powered development environments.

name: WebTerm
description: Browser-based terminal that safely runs powerful commands (even rm -rf /) in a sandboxed environment. Enables AI agents to execute terminal operations safely from the browser.

name: GitHub Agent HQ
description: Platform that unites Claude, Codex & Copilot directly in GitHub & VS Code. Brings order to AI-powered coding by providing centralized agent management with governance, security, and audit capabilities.

name: SessionCast
description: CLI tool providing remote monitoring and control of Claude Code sessions. Enables developers to access Claude Code running on local machines from any device.

name: OpenClaw
description: Open-source AI coding agent described as 'The AI that actually does things.' Launched multiple tools in February 2026 including MemoryPlugin and ClawSimple for autonomous task execution.
